article.name: External Link
article.description: External Link to use instead of linking to Blog Post

collection.name: B2B Inventory Adjust
collection.description: sku and adjustment pairs for B2B inventory updates

order.name: Customer Reference/PO Number
order.description: Any customer given identifier. Will be included in the "order invoice" emails.

page.name: gales-style
page.description: For collection carousels, use the style of Gales site (rounded corners, images from products)

product.name: SEO HIDDEN PRODUCT
product.description: If listing is variant (i.e. included in a merged parent), then set as TRUE

product.name: VARIANT MERGE LIST
product.description: List of product handles to merge to main product, separated by commas

product.name: PARENT PRODUCT
product.description: Enter Parent Product HANDLE for Redirect

product.name: Limited Edition
product.description: Limited Edition Style/Color

product.name: Product Name Override
product.description: Name used in Home Page Collection Carousels and Wholesale Products

product.name: New
product.description: Add the tag "New" to Color Selector

product.name: Collection Page Split Option
product.description: To split out Product on the collection pages, add the option name to split by here.

product.name: Corner treatment
product.description: Shows corner treatment on the product cards

product.name: Size Guide
product.description: Link to sizeguide page

product.name: Product rating
product.description: Average rating from customers

product.name: Product rating count
product.description: Total number of ratings from customers

product.name: Google: Custom Product
product.description: Use to indicate whether or not the unique product identifiers (UPIs) GTIN, MPN, and brand are available for your product.

product.name: Collection Page Image
product.description: Alternative image for collection pages and product carousels. If empty, will use first product image

product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.name: Related products
product.description: List of related products

product.name: Related products settings
product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Complementary products
product.description: List of complementary products

product.name: Product Page Product Name Subtitle
product.description: Product Subtitle on Product Page

product.name: Pre-order Estimated Ship Date Text
product.description: Enter a text entry for the ship date (e.g. Estimated Ship Date May 15th)

product.name: Slip Resistance
product.description: Select from list

product.name: Collection Subtitle 2
product.description: Add a second subtitle under the product name on the collection page

product.name: Collection Subtitle 1
product.description: Add a subtitle under the product name on the collection page

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Closure type
product.description: Defines the method used to fasten or secure a product, such as zipper or buckles

product.name: Target gender
product.description: Identifies the intended gender for a product, such as female, male or unisex

product.name: Shoe fit
product.description: Defines the width of footwear, such as narrow or wide

product.name: Toe style
product.description: Defines the shape or design of a shoe's toe, such as open or pointed

product.name: Care instructions
product.description: Provides guidance for product upkeep, such as hand wash or dry clean only

product.name: Shoe features
product.description: Identifies special characteristics of shoes, such as waterproof or lightweight

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 4
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 3
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 2
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 1
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 0
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns

variant.name: Google: Size System
variant.description: The country of the size system used by your product.

variant.name: Google: Gender
variant.description: The gender for which your product is intended.

variant.name: Google: Condition
variant.description: The condition of your product at time of sale.

variant.name: Google: Age Group
variant.description: The demographic for which your product is intended.

variant.name: Force Pre-order Messaging
variant.description: Even if Inv > 0. NOTE: Must still have "Continue selling when out of stock" enabled on each sku
